body_html:
@DavidNorman

Hi David, sorry for removing this in my earlier change: I wasn't quite sure what the empty BUILD file was for, and whether / how you were using it.

I wonder:

  1. depending on your need, is there an alternative solution than introducing a new directory with an empty BUILD file?
  2. if not, I would suggest adding more comments in the BUILD file, or add README.md to this directory itself to indicate how it is being used, and why it is unwise to remove it :)

Thanks!
body:
@DavidNorman

Hi David, sorry for removing this in my earlier change: I wasn't quite sure what the empty BUILD file was for, and whether / how you were using it. 

I wonder:
1. depending on your need, is there an alternative solution than introducing a new directory with an empty BUILD file?
2. if not, I would suggest adding more comments in the BUILD file, or add README.md to this directory itself to indicate how it is being used, and why it is unwise to remove it :)

Thanks!
